Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: and waits for the chain to advance

Author: jl777c#5810

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: It saves all block hashes, just incase it needs them to link back if the main chains order changes from reorg

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: up to a max of 128 blocks, when it gets to 128 blocksit clears the oldest 64 and waits for the next notarization
